name: Daniel Meza
title: Budtender
coverLetter:
I wanted to express my extreme interest in employment as a budtender in response to your ad. I believe that my charisma, sales experience, and intimate knowledge of industry products are perfectly in-line with what you are looking for in an employee. Additionally, my friendly and outgoing personality makes me a perfect fit for the team.  

I have a lot of experience in the industry as a patient, and I am hoping to be a part of what I believe to be one of the most important movements of the 21st century by way of using my customer service skills to help those in need.

If you review my resume, you will see that I am comfortable in high-pressure and fast-paced jobs, and excel at customer service because of my friendly attitude. Finally, my open availability and punctuality make me a prime employee to have on staff for weekends, holidays, and sudden shift changes that need filling. Feel free to contact me at any time. 

Thank you for your consideration and time, 
Sincerely,
M. Daniel Meza
